description: Conversion of garage into habitable room (following partial demolition of garage) involving replacing garage door with window
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):EX - L001 (Existing Location and OS Map); EX - P001 (Existing Basement); EX - P002 (Existing Ground Floor); EX - P003 (Existing First Floor); EX - P004 (Existing Loft); EX - P005 (Existing Roof Plan); EX - E001 (Existing Front And Rear Elevation); EX - E002 (Existing Side Elevation 1); EX - E003 (Existing Side Elevation 2); EX - S001 (Existing Section); EX - PR001 (Existing Perspective View); PR - L001 Rev A (Proposed Location and OS Map); PR - P001 Rev A (Proposed Basement); PR - P002 Rev A (Proposed Ground Floor); PR - P003 Rev A (Proposed First Floor); PR - P004 Rev A (Proposed Loft); PR - P005 Rev A (Proposed Roof Plan); PR - E001 Rev A (Proposed Front And Rear Elevation); PR - E002 Rev A (Proposed Side Elevation 1); PR - E003 Rev A (Proposed Side Elevation 2); PR - S001 Rev A (Proposed Section); PR - PR001 Rev A (Proposed Perspective View).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
